content: stardew valley duck a few notes - inspired by concerned ape s stardew valley and kit wolf s stardew valley chicken pattern yarn wolf creations - yarn and hook size are flexible i used caron simply soft yarn with a 4 25 mm hook but you can use whatever yarn and hook size you want - i use safety pins to mark the start of each round because i crochet very tight stitches and find a safety pin easier to use that a stitch marker - i do not do gauge swatches - i live dangerously supplies - yarn brown green black yellow - crochet hook - stitch marker or safety pin - tapestry needle 1 body brown yarn 1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet 2 increase 6 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 4 single_crochet 2 increase x 6 24 5 single_crochet 7 increase x 3 27 6 single_crochet 8 increase x 3 30 7 wings x2 brown yarn 1 magic_ring 6 6 2 single_crochet increase x 3 9 3 single_crochet 2 increase x 3 12 4 single_crochet 2 increase x 4 16 5 single_crochet 3 esc double_crochet in next st double_crochet 1 6 chain 2 single_crochet 2 down chain-2 single_crochet 2 down the side of the double_crochet single_crochet 10 slip_stitch esc double_crochet 2 in next st lsl st double_crochet 3 in next st single_crochet down side of double_crochet slip_stitch double_crochet 3 in next st slip_stitch 7 bind off and sew onto left side of body for right wing mirror the pattern by sewing left-handed or by crocheting towards you instead of away put crochet hook into the loops back-front instead of front-back 4 feet x2 yellow yarn 1 chain 3 slip_stitch 2 x 3 sc3tog chain 2 slip_stitch 2 fasten_off sew to connect to the beginning of the round and sew onto the body tail brown yarn 1 magic_ring 4 4 2 single_crochet
